subject: a couple of new evp's from fm sweep(one about purple lady)
author: bhali333
full_text:
hey guy's 
here are a couple from the last session. I believe I am having great 
sucess with this method. I am in the process of trying to get a box 
built but the the electronics companies I have contacted seem to be too 
busy to do one board. If I'm doing so well with this manual sweep I 
can't wait to see how a box works out. anyway give a listen and let me 
know what you think.

bruce
